Inputs.Label: Тип задачи
Inputs.Name: TaskTypeID
Inputs.SQL: SELECT TaskTypeID, TaskTypeName FROM employee_task_type WHERE LinkType = 2 AND Active = 1 AND ConditionDate <= Curdate()

Inputs.Label: Сотрудник
Inputs.Name: UserID
Inputs.SQL: SELECT su.UserID, su.Fullname, emp.PostName FROM sys_users su INNER JOIN employee em ON su.UserID= em .UserID INNER JOIN employees_posts emp ON emp .PostID = em.BrokerPostID WHERE su.Active = 1 AND $auth->getAccessUsersSQL();
